Name: High Stomp
Description: Stomp on an enemy from above.

Name: Focus<effect,focus>
Description: Increases your attack power for your next attack by 2.
Infinite Stacking: `+<var,2> attack

Name: Multistomp
Description: Stomp on all enemies in a row.
Infinite Stacking: Does stomp + <var,2,-2> damage

Name: Electro Stomp<effect,shocked>
Description: Jump on an enemy with electric element. Ignores all contact hazards. (<commontext,explainair>)
Infinite Stacking: Special element formula: <commontext,explainairadvanced>. Inflicts Defense Down <var,2,-2> for 3 turns. Does stomp + <var,2,-4> base damage.

Name: Taunt<effect,berserk>
Description: Makes all enemies berserk and makes them target the user.
Infinite Stacking: Inflicts <var,2,1> turns of Berserk.

Name: Paralyze Stomp<effect,paralyze>
Description: Jump on an enemy with electric element and paralyze it. Ignores all contact hazards. Paralyzing an enemy will halve its attack power. (<commontext,explainair>)
Infinite Stacking: Inflicts <var,2,1> turns of Paralyze.

Name: Flame Stomp<effect,burned>
Description: Jump on an enemy with flame element. (<commontext,explainfire>)
L2 Description: Inflicts Sunder 3 at the end of your turn.
Infinite Stacking: Inflicts Sunder <var,1,2> at the end of your turn. Base damage is stomp + <var,2>

Name: Double Stomp
Description: Jump on an enemy twice. Base hit is stomp + 1. Second hit is 0.75x as strong.
L2 Description: Hits 3 times, but 3rd hit is x0.75 of the 2nd hit.
Infinite Stacking: Hits <var,1,1> times, but each hit is 0.75x as strong as the last hit.

Name: Overstomp
Description: Stomp an enemy a little too hard. (Deals recoil damage equal to base stomp power)
Infinite Stacking: Damage dealt is stomp + <var,5,7>, recoil damage is stomp + <var,3,-3>

Name: Smart Stomp
Description: Stomp on an enemy and inflict the ailment they are weakest to. (Highest turn count, but only tries to inflict ailments that the enemy is currently susceptible to.)
Infinite Stacking: Inflicts <var,2,1> turns of status.

Name: Team Quake
Description: (Requires Luna) Deals massive damage to all grounded enemies 3 times. Each subsequent hit is 0.75x as strong.
Infinite Stacking: Hits <var,2,1> times.

Name: Egg Toss<badge,strangeegg>
Description: Lay an egg and use it immediately (either throwing it at an enemy or using it on yourself.)
Infinite Stacking: Lay <var,1> eggs.

Name: Slash
Description: Slash an enemy. Pierces 1 defense. (Defense is treated as if it was lowered by 1, if defense is at least 1)

Name: Electro Slash<effect,shocked>
Description: Slash an enemy with air/electric element. (<commontext,explainair>)
L2 Description: 2 hits, second hit is 50% of first hit
L3 Description: 3 hits, subsequent hits are 50% weaker than previous hits
Infinite Stacking: <var,1> hits, subsequent hits are 50% weaker than previous hits

Name: Slip Slash
Description: Slip past grounded enemies to hit a target behind them. Deals damage to enemies that get passed.
L2 Description: Does 1 more to passed enemies, 2 more to the target.
Infinite Stacking: Does slash + <var,1,-3> damage to passed enemies, slash + <var,1,-1> to the target.

Name: Poison Slash<effect,poison>
Description: Slash an enemy and inflict Poison.
Infinite Stacking: Inflicts <var,2,1> turns of Poison.

Name: Precise Stab<effect,soaked>
Description: Stab an enemy with water element. (<commontext,explainwater>)
Infinite Stacking: Special element formula: <commontext,explainwateradvanced>. Base damage is slash + <var,2,2>.

Name: Sword Bolt<effect,shocked>
Description: Shoot a lightning bolt that can hit any position. (<commontext,explainair>)
Infinite Stacking: Does slash + <var,4,-1> base damage.

Name: Sword Dance<effect,focus>
Description: A special dance that can hit any grounded enemy and preserves Focus (Focus is not lost after this attack, and it gives 3 Focus.)
Infinite Stacking: Does slash + <var,3,-3> base damage and gives you <var,3> Focus.

Name: Boomerang Slash
Description: Throw your sword out to hit any position. Hits twice. Returning hit is stronger.
Infinite Stacking: Does slash + <var,2,-2> damage on the first hit, <var,2,-1> on the second hit.

Name: Dark Slash<effect,cursed>
Description: Slash an enemy with dark element. (<commontext,explaindark>)
Infinite Stacking: Special element formula: <commontext,explaindarkadvanced>. Does slash + <var,3,4> base damage.

Name: Aetherize<effect,ethereal>
Description: Become ethereal for 1 turn, preventing most attacks from hitting you. (Also costs an extra action to all targets)
L3 Description: Targets both, does not inflict Cooldown.
Infinite Stacking: Targets both, does not inflict Cooldown. Gives you <var,1,-3> turns of Ethereal.

Name: Flame Bat<effect,burned>
Description: Launch a flaming ball that can hit any position. Refunds your turn if it hits and action command is successful. Action command difficulty increases the more actions you have taken. (<commontext,explainfire>)
Infinite Stacking: Does ceil(slash/2) + <var,2,-2> base damage.

Name: Astral Wall<effect,astralwall>
Description: Protects you from losing more than 25% of your max hp of damage in a single turn. Failed action command results it in getting capped at half max HP instead. Effect gets removed at the end of turn after damage is capped.
L3 Description: Targets both, applies Astral Recovery for 3 turns
Infinite Stacking: Targets both, applies the effect and Astral Recovery for <var,1> turns. Protects you from losing up to (1 / <var,1,1>) of your Max HP.
